doc.title: Method of operation
doc.para: Method of operation The following describes how to operate KAG. This is generally written. Some functions may not be used depending on the game, etc., so I wonder if you can copy and paste this as it is and write it in the manual of the game etc. (sweat)

dl.dt: "Left click" or "Rotate wheel forward" or "Return key" or "Space key"
dl.dd: Actions such as reading or deciding an option, pressing a button, checking a check box, etc.
Display message history or call right-click subroutine
Move between choices, buttons, single line edits and checkboxes
Follow the bookmark (in free save mode)
